release_notes: BEEP base 1.5.11 offers log file rotation and the ability to program it's hardware (ATECC) id by cable (in case the BEEP base PCB (v3.3) does not contain the (currently unavailable) ATECC chip). This is a new firmware version for BEEP base v3.3 or higher, but will also run normally on older versions of the BEEP base.

BEEP base 1.5.10 offers log rotation reading functionality (for both Android and iOS) and the ability to disable the tilt sensor and power the BEEP base with the magnet: on (3s) / off (10s). It also adds correct time based logging in its flash memory, and sends its time via LoRa at each restart. This is an update for firmware 1.4.2 or higher.

BEEP base 1.5.9 offers stabilized full log reading functionality (for both Android and iOS) and the ability to disable the tilt sensor and power the BEEP base with the magnet: on (3s) / off (10s). It also adds correct time based logging in its flash memory, and sends its time via LoRa at each restart. This is an update for firmware 1.4.2 or higher.

BEEP base 1.5.8 offers stabilized full log reading functionality (for both Android and iOS) and the ability to disable the tilt sensor and power the BEEP base with the magnet: on (3s) / off (10s). It also adds correct time based logging in its flash memory. It is an update for firmware 1.4.2 or higher.

BEEP base 1.5.7 offers stabilized full log reading functionality (for both Android and iOS) and the ability to disable the tilt sensor and power the BEEP base with the magnet: on (3s) / off (10s). It also adds time based logging in its flash memory. It is an update for firmware 1.4.2 or higher.

BEEP base 1.5.6 offers stabilized full log reading functionality (for both Android and iOS) and the ability to disable the tilt sensor and power the BEEP base with the magnet: on (3s) / off (10s). It also adds time based logging in its flash memory. It is an update for firmware 1.4.2 or higher.
BEEP base 1.4.2 adds a fix for stability of LoRa messages sent over KPN LoRaWAN. You should replace 1.4.1 with 1.4.2.
BEEP base 1.4.0 adds the ability to switch off the tilt sensor.
BEEP base 1.3.5 adds a tilt switch stabilization timer.
BEEP base 1.3.4 adds improvements for LoRa.

BEEP base 1.3.3 adds energy improvements: The default measurement interval is now 15 minutes instead of 1 minute. Of course this can still be overriden.

If you have already configured your BEEP base with a different measurement interval, it will not be overwritten.
BEEP base 1.4.1 adds a fix for sending sensor data by KPN LoRaWAN.

BEEP base 1.5.5 offers stabilized full log reading functionality (only on Android) and the ability to disable the tilt sensor and power the BEEP base with the magnet: on (3s) / off (10s). It also adds time based logging in its flash memory. It is an update for firmware 1.4.2 or higher.

BEEP base 1.5.4 offers log reading functionality and the ability to disable the tilt sensor and power the BEEP base with the magnet: on (3s) / off (10s). It also adds time based logging in its flash memory. It is an update for firmware 1.4.2 or higher.

BEEP base 1.5.3 offers log reading functionality and the ability to disable the tilt sensor and power the BEEP base with the magnet: on (3s) / off (10s). It also adds time based logging in its flash memory. It is an update for firmware 1.4.2 or higher.

BEEP base 1.5.2 offers the ability to switch off the tilt sensor and switch on (3s) / off (10s) the BEEP base with magnet only. It also adds time logging in flash memory. It is an update for firmware 1.4.2 or higher.
BEEP base 1.5.1 offers the ability to switch on (3s) / off (10s) the BEEP base with magnet only. It also adds time logging in flash memory. It is an update for firmware 1.5.0.

BEEP base 1.5.0 removes the tilt sensor functionality and makes it possible to switch on/off the base by holding the magnet in front of the side for 10 seconds. It also adds time logging in flash memory.
